entries.tip_solicitor_droid: A special function droid designed for use by entertainers to facilitate ease of tipping.
entries.r2_crafted_advanced: In addition to its other abilities, this astromech can serve as a private crafting station for weapon, droid, furniture, installation, and generic item types.
